KitKat::

She followed ner nose to the place of the scent. She crouched under a 
bush and watch something she had never really seen  before. But had 
heard the stories. She rubbed her optics and stared wide opticed at 
the scene before her. Here was a male black wolf bot showing a small 
fox bot how to pounce and catch prey. She stared in utter amazement. 
Could this be happening, she thought. She stayed down wind of them so 
they would not smell her. She stayed crouched under the bush and 
watched. She saw them pouncing on a drone of some sort. She sighed 
and smiled slightly. Such things were forbidden to the old code of 
predacons. A family would give the enemy someting to hold over you in 
battle. And if something happened to them, you could not focus on 
what you were doing, you'd be focused on how they were. She shook her 
head and sighed. She was about to turn away, when the pain in her 
stomach came back but with force. She fell to the ground and lay 
there, in wolf mode, panting heavily and in great pain. Under the 
bush, she wasn't all that visible. She knew if she could not get 
herself back to the base, either those bots just 50 yeards from here 
would find her by her signal, or she could die there. Either way, she 
didn't like her choises.
